Class MasterOfPuppets

  • java.lang.Object
    • MasterOfPuppets

  • public class MasterOfPuppets
extends java.lang.Object
    Master process. Apply the following transformations: Input File to SPLIT_X.txt Call Slave.jar SPLIT_X.txt to UM_Y.txt UM_Y.txt to SM_Z.txt Call Slave.jar SM_Z.txt to RM_S.txt All RM_S.txt to Output Fie
    Author:
    rom

      • splitInputFile

        public static void splitInputFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                  int numSplits)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        splitInputFile simply splits fileName content in numSplits distinct files.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Main input file that will be split. A txt file. Cut can be done in a middle of a word.
        numSplits - Number of part to generate, the name will be SPLIT_(num).txt stored in working directory.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • splitInputFile2

        public static void splitInputFile2(java.lang.String fileName,
                                   int numLines)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        splitInputFile simply splits fileName content in N distinct files. Where N = number of line of fileName / numLines
        Parameters:
        fileName - Main input file that will be split. A txt file. .
        numLines - Number of line per file, the name will be SPLIT_(num).txt stored in working directory.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readCSVFile

        public static void readCSVFile(java.lang.String csvFile)
        Read a "Salve List" file. Example: "user@c130-25,/cal/homes/user/git/SANDBOX/SLAVE3 /cal/homes/user/git/SANDBOX/SLAVE1"
        Parameters:
        csvFile - A file containing Slaves addresses. 1 line per Slave.
